feature_model.name: client_data
feature_model.feature_tree: :r client_data (client_data) :m decision (decision) :m Financials (Financials) :m Reporting (Reporting) :m Data_Capture (Data_Capture) :m LOB (LOB) :m Insurance_Policy (Insurance_Policy) :m UW (UW) :o car_details (car_details) :o Third_Party_Services (Third_Party_Services) :o Credit_Check (Credit_Check) :g [1, 1] : advanced (advanced) : simple (simple) :o Add_Validation (Add_Validation) :o VIN_Validation (VIN_Validation) :o house_details (house_details) :g [1, *] : Home (Home) : Auto (Auto) :g [1, *] : TP (TP) : Comprehensive (Comprehensive) : watercraft (watercraft) : commercial (commercial)
